description: Turkey's president condemns a call by Europe's rights court to free a jailed Kurdish political leader.
title: Erdogan attacks Europe court's order for Demirtas's release
title_page: Erdogan attacks Europe court's order for Demirtas's release - BBC News
maintext: In its ruling, the European Court of Human Rights found that by detaining Demirtas Turkey had "pursued the ulterior purpose of stifling pluralism and limiting freedom of political debate". It found no clear link between his speeches and terrorism offences and ruled that Turkey should take immediate measures to release him.
